article_node.title: Fury as another Cadbury favourite is hit by shrinkflation
article_node.summary: Cadbury has faced backlash from consumers after reducing the number of Brunch bars in a pack from five to four while maintaining the same price of Â£1.50, effectively increasing the cost per bar by 20%. This change follows a previous reduction in the bar's weight from 32g to 28g, leading to accusations of 'shrinkflation' and corporate greed. Many shoppers expressed their frustration on social media, vowing to boycott the brand due to perceived deceptive practices.
